entry.value:
[{"id":"JT-47172","entityId":"25-1985226","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47172"},{"name":"summary","value":"Create issue on agile board remove summary & description when server return 412(Precondition failure)"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  • Press [Ctrl-N] on agile board
  • Set [slow 3G] connection in developer tools
  • Change summary, description & custom field*
  • Server return 412(Precondition failure)

AR: summary & description removed
ER: We should not get 412 on own** changes

Video: https://screencast.com/t/v3wwVdTO

* - Here the main idea to get 412 on update summary or description
** - own means when you change something in current tab

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1526153743113"},{"name":"updated","value":"1526310011096"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"1"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-607","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"maksimrv","fullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Agile Board"],"valueId":["Agile Board"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 67","id":"YouTrack:sprint 67"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2864699","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-47172","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

To solve this problem we should

  1. Implement/reuse the same logic as on new create issue page*.
  2. Update of issue's fields should be made in the create form (not in fields' panel directive)**

* - On create issue page we have only one active request and if something changed during this request in the form we just put a new request in the request queue.
When the active request is finished we just check is the request queue is empty and if it's not empty we send a new request for update draft on the server.
Request queue has a size equal 1 (if a user changed issue 10 times during active request in the queue should be only one postponed request)

** - Now fields' panel send a request to update issue when something changed in it but this logic play badly if we have another place which update issue and can lead
to precondition failure(412) because of race condition. This component should be "stupid" and delegate update to root controller so an update should be only in one place

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1526154245708,"updated":1526154268606,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47111","entityId":"25-1981111","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47111"},{"name":"summary","value":"Project selector on the new issue screen does not respect favorite projects"},{"name":"description","value":"
  1. Click [Create Issue] button
  2. On the new issue form try to change project

AR: Project dropdown contains all projects sorted alphabetically
ER: Project dropdown shows favorite projects first

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1525768650140"},{"name":"updated","value":"1526309125797"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Leonid.Stryuk"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Leonid Stryuk"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"jk"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Evgeny Naumenko"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"2"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-607","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Issue Creation"],"valueId":["Issue Creation"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 67","id":"YouTrack:sprint 67"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2865522","author":"maksimrv","authorFullName":"Maksim Ryzhikov","issueId":"JT-47111","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Anna Zhdan should it be fixed on the server or client?
As a long-term solution, I think it's better to fix it on the server (by sort parameter for example) because we could implement lazy loading in the future.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1526285423265,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2865653","author":"Anna.Zhdan","authorFullName":"Anna Zhdan","issueId":"JT-47111","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Maksim Ryzhikov I think that for now It's better to do it on the client
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1526287638809,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-47149","entityId":"25-1983309","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47149"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add an ability to edit attachment in the comments on new FSI"},{"name":"description","value":"

Plese note that after I clicked "add comment" this "edit" button appeared.

build 41715

STR:

  1. Make some field required
  2. Start creating new issue, fill summary, leave required field empty
  3. Try to submit issue via Ctrl+Enter

AR:
CW is opened

If you leave opened tab with ticket for longer time and you then want to download a file from the ticket, chrome says "download failed" but the file is downloaded with fixed context (example in the attachments). If you do refresh (F5) and download file it is downloaded properly.

It looks the download link doesn't refresh oauth2 token automatically and you need to do it manually with F5.
